explains: n. 侵吞，挪用；拨款，拨付；所拨款项，专款
wordGroup: appropriation bill n. 政府年出预算案

sentences.en: Other charges include fraud and illegal appropriation of land.
sentences.cn: 其他指控包括诈骗和非法占用土地。

sentences.en: Perhaps struggle unfolds first, not at an economic or social level, but over the appropriation of air, essential to life itself.
sentences.cn: 也许斗争首先出现，不是在经济或社会层面，而是在空气上的占有，空气对生命本身是必不可少的。

sentences.en: The appropriation of new knowledge through creativity.
sentences.cn: 在创造性实践中灵活运用新知识的能力。
